Description:
Bellissimo - Outstanding craftsmanship!
You could be forgiven for thinking you are walking through a Villa in Florence when entering this exquisite property. Built and renovated using the finest stone, timber and imported materials; the residence combines beautiful quality Italian craftsmanship, a practical floor plan, an emphasis on entertaining & landscaped gardens - to create this wonderful, unique property. Boasting 3 bedrooms (main with WIR and ensuite), 2 separate living areas ,a kitchen which boasts granite bench tops, quality appliances, pantry, the attic space is a rare treat in this property and undercover alfresco entertaining areas.
Other features include: ducted heating, cozy fireplace in the family room for those romantic evenings, 2 car garage with remote, garden shed , plus lots more.
The property is located within a short drive multiple to shopping centers, close to schools, bus stop, medical centre and easy access to freeways.
Call now for an appointment to inspect this amazing property!
Insights: 24 Merijig Avenue, Cranbourne VIC 3977 was last sold in 2020 and 165 other 3 bedroom house in Cranbourne have recently been sold.

Description:
EASY LIVING IN THE HEART OF CENTRAL CRANBOURNE - ONE PROUD OWNER!
CRANBOURNE CENTRAL: Whether youre an owner occupier or astute investor who is highly focused on location, this rear unit on a secure block of just 2 is sure to tick all of the boxes!
Low maintenance by design and in great condition thanks to its caring owner, the functional floorplan offers instant comfort with the ability for the lucky new purchaser to further customise to suit their personal needs, style and taste.
Features include a spacious lounge/dining room with gas heating and a pristine kitchen with an upright gas oven/stove and adjoining tiled meals area. There are 2 bedrooms that both feature built in wardrobes as well as an immaculate family bathroom, separate toilet and a full laundry.
Step outside to be greeted by a single lock up garage with ample space to park an additional vehicle. Don't forget the private courtyard that wraps around 3 sides of the property and includes a covered entertainment area providing a place for those quiet relaxing occasions!
If you believe in the age old theory that good real estate revolves around a central location in a fast growing community then you won't be disappointed! Within moments to Narre Warren - Cranbourne Road providing direct access to the shopping facilities situated at Thompsons Parkway/Casey Central.
The recently revamped Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre is only a brisk walk away and offers the best of the best when it comes to local eating spots. On top of this there is a plethora of public/private schooling and tafe options to select from, easy access to South Gippsland/Westernport Highways and local bus stops enroute to the Cranbourne train station. Not to mention the child care centres and medical facilities that are all close by!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW! - *PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS*
Our floor plans are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy or details contained in our floor plans.
Insights: 2/8 Grace Street, Cranbourne VIC 3977 was last sold in 2017 and 23 other 2 bedroom unit in Cranbourne have recently been sold.

Walking distance to Carlisle Primary School and short distance to Springhill Shopping Centre.

Description:
First Home Buyers & Investors Alert! Near New Townhouse!
This amazing double storey townhouse located in Maddison Gardens Estate is only a stone's throw out from Amstel Park golf course, St Peter's Secondary College, public transport, shops, schools, child care and close to freeway access. Perfect for the savvy investor or first home buyer.
3 bedroom double storey townhouse with an impressive kitchen, stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, stone bench tops, glass splash back, powder room, laundry, separate living and dining opening up to rear entertaining area.
Upstairs consist of a study alcove, 3 bedrooms, master with full ensuite and walk in robe, other bedrooms with BIR's, also a separate bathroom and toilet.
Generous low maintenance private backyard, which is perfect for entertainment. Features include double lock up garage at the rear, split reverse cycle air conditioning, heating, water tank and lots more.
This modern home is sure to impress, contact Leon or Waseem directly today for further details ......

Description:
FAMILY FRIENDLY BROOKLAND GREENS!
This modern 3 bedroom home offers exceptional value and is a must to inspect!
Comprising: generous front lounge, master bedroom with WIR & ensuite, massive open plan kitchen/dining/living area, remote double garage with internal access plus rear roller door through to the generous back yard with room to build a great shed or just plenty of room for the kids & pets to play!
Approximately 8 years young the notable features of this home include: Ducted heating, Evaporative cooling, Fully appointed kitchen with gas cook top, electric oven & dishwasher, Rear roller door access, Generous front lounge, Internal access from garage and more all set on a fabulous 529m2 block
!NSPECTION WILL NOT DISAPPOINT - BUT BE QUICK!
Brookland Greens Estate is set in a secluded pocket to the south west of Cranbourne and provides a rarely found way of life with an abundance of parks, walking/biking trails, parklands with exercise and play equipment, walking distance to St Peter's College while also near to the new Barton Primary School and supermarket/shopping centre currently under construction while only minutes for Cranboure Park Shopping Centre. Add to this ease of access to major arterial roads, conveniently located to not one, but two golf courses this home must not be missed.

Description:
Immaculate family home with granny flat
Dual living at its best! Beautifully detailed and immaculately presented is this single level residence with a fully self-contained one bedroom granny flat/unit attached. Offering separate entrance and power outlet to both dwellings. You may choose to use it for parents/in-laws accommodation, business outlet, teenage retreat, guest accommodation or even rent it outâ the opportunity is endless.
From the entrance of the main residence, you are welcomed over quality tiles which leads you to the formal living. You will be impressed by its sheer elegance.
- Spacious ensuite & walk in robe to master & other 4 bedrooms with BIR's.
- Modern kitchen with island bench, gas cooktop & stainless steel appliances
- Ducted heating & 2 split system
- Electronic window shutters
- Neat, manicured, low maintenance garden front & back
- Private & easy side access to granny flat/unit
- Quality timber flooring throughout
- Undercover pergola with abundance of space ideal for outdoor entertaining
- Double car accommodation with rear & internal access
Only a short stroll away from Springhill Shopping Centre, Cranbourne Carlisle Primary School and many more amenities.
The opportunity is there! You can earn extra money from it or be the in-laws' favourite.
Photo ID required for all inspections

Description:
DECEPTIVELY SPACIOUS IDEAL INVESTMENT
CRANBOURNE: If you are looking for a property offering outstanding value for money which is located minutes from school, child care, sports ground, parks and public transport then you have come to the right address! Ideally suited to first timers or down sizers, this functional floor plan would also suit for those looking to invest.
The moment you walk thru the door of this home you will be thoroughly impressed with the formal living room which then flows through to the open plan kitchen, meals and family area. The kitchen comes with plenty of storage, stainless steel wall oven, gas cook top plus dishwasher.
The master suite is ideally located at the front of the home and is fitted with a full en suite while the remaining 3 bedrooms are at the rear and are serviced by the central bathroom.
While the back yard is low maintenance there is plenty of room for the kids to play, and spend time as a family!
Properties like these do not last long so if you are looking to secure this home and do not want to lose out, please make sure to attend the open for inspection.
Added internal and external features include:
* Approximately 19 sq in total (includes garage)
* Approximately 300 sqm land
* Two living zones
* Formal living
* Open plan kitchen/dining/family area
* Two split systems (heating & cooling)
* Double garage
* Stainless steel wall oven
* Stainless gas cook top
* Dishwasher
* Tiled entrance
* Master with full en suite
* Cranbourne Carlisle Primary School is approximately ten minutes walk from the house
* Springhill Dr/Thompson Rd Bus stop is approximately seven minutes walk from the house
* Park land with playground is approximately five minutes walk away from the house
* Springhill Shopping Centre is approximately three minutes drive away from the house
* Merinda Park Train Station is approximately four minutes drive away from the house
* Cranbourne Home Maker Centre is approximately seven minutes drive from the house
****PHOTO IDENTIFICATION REQUIRED AT ALL OPENS****

Description:
Treat Yourself To This Park Frontage Family Home
Located in one of Cranbourne's most sought after Brookland Greens Estate on a 600(approx)sqm block with easy access to all amenities and main roads while being surrounded by parks, nature trails and the wonderful Royal Botanic Gardens this home is worth a look!
Featuring,
- Four bedroom master with walk-in robe and ensuite
- Open kitchen with stainless steel appliances
- Huge covered pergola and landscaped gardens to front and rear
- Three Separate living areas including front formal lounge, open plan
meals family area and a rumpus room at the back.
Other features include heating and cooling, double lock up garage with another rear single garage to park your 3rd car or a caravan or a boat. Within walking distance to St Peter College public transport and Ranfurlie golf course this home is sure to impress. To find out more contact Vikram today on 0430392918.

Description:
**UNDER OFFER / UNDER CONTRACT**
CRANBOURNE: Set in the quietest of positions at the bowl of a court, this property provides a perfect living environment that is still within minutes of the local train station, the recently rejuvenated Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre and Cranbourne West Primary School!
Ideal for young families, empty nesters and investors who recognise the strength of a central position, 13 Marnebeck Court is set on a generous block of app. 651m2 and is surrounded by manicured gardens. With existing covered accommodation for 3 cars, this is the perfect opportunity for tradespeople and those with recreational vehicles as the broad driveway offers ample additional parking space!
Step inside and be greeted by an inviting floor plan with features including a spacious lounge/dining room and a separate meals area that adjoins the timeless and fully equipped Blackwood timber kitchen. There are 3 robed bedrooms, including the master with a modernised semi-ensuite that complements the family bathroom and second toilet. Extras include ducted heating and a split system air conditioner!
Outside you will find an extensive covered entertaining area and a secure rear yard complete with 2 garden sheds, a single gated carport and a double garage that has been previously used as a bonus living quarters. Don't forget the recently re-sealed and re-painted roof and the 3kW 7 panel solar system!
If you believe in the age old theory that good real estate revolves around a central location then you won't be disappointed! Within moments to Narre Warren - Cranbourne Road, providing direct access to the shopping facilities situated at Thompsons Parkway/Casey Central, and South Gippsland Highway, enroute to High Street! Those that dont drive can take advantage of the many public transport options close by!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW - PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS!
Our floor plans are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy or details contained in our floor plans.

Description:
CLOSE TO EVERYTHING
****AUCTION THIS SATURDAY OPEN AT 1130AM*****
A freshly painted property offering outstanding value which is located minutes from schools, child care, sports ground, Springhill Shops, parks and public transport including bus stops and train stations. Ideally suited to first timers or down sizers, this functional floor plan would also suit for those looking to invest.
Comprising of 3 spacious bedrooms (master with full ensuite and walk in robe),2 living areas, generous size kitchen and a convenient study situated in the centre of the home.
Double garage with internal access and the convenience of a corner block with easy access to get to the rear.
* Cranbourne Carlisle Primary School is approximately ten minutes walk from the house
* Springhill Dr/Thompson Rd Bus stop is approximately seven minutes walk from the house
* Park land with playground is approximately five minutes walk away from the house
* Springhill Shopping Centre is approximately three minutes drive away from the house
* Merinda Park Train Station is approximately four minutes drive away from the house
* Cranbourne Home Maker Centre is approximately seven minutes drive from the house

Original house, now the front unit of only three. Large home with full ensuite to master 3 good sized bedrooms and two zoned living areas, there is a stainless steel cooker and handy sized dishwasher to the kitchen which also has a separate meals area.
Two split systems and a brand new instant hot water service an added bonus, this is a spacious home with an outside pergola patio area with garden shed and private front yard.
A lock up garage with auto door completes the picture and being only a short walk to schools, train station and all facilities makes this home a wonderful purchase for some lucky buyer.

Description:
**GRAND OPEN FOR INSPECTION SATURDAY JULY 29 AT 12.00PM-12.20PM AND 4.30PM-4.50PM**
CRANBOURNE CENTRAL - Living doesn't get any more convenient than this established 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom brick veneer home with plenty of features for the astute buyer in a most sought after location. From the moment you walk into this lovely property, you'll embrace that special feeling of 'being home'. With a gas space heater emitting a warming glow throughout the entire home, you can leave Winter and your hats and coats at the front door. In summer, air-conditioned comfort with ceiling fans to all bedrooms and living spaces, create a cooling environment to retire to at the end of a hot day! This original dwelling built in 1972, and lovingly owned and cared for the past 39 years by the same family has a great floor plan with plenty of room to renovate or update as you choose. Out the back you have an undercover alfresco pergola perfect for the home entertainer, overlook all you survey, watch the kids at play or the do-it-your-selfer working away in the spacious DLUG. This property is a must see. Investor? First home buyer? Downsizer? Upsizer? Renovator? You're all covered here. A top investment in a top location on a great 617sqm block of land. Set to buy? Contact this agent now!
Walking distance to:
* Cranbourne train station - 11 minutes
* Local shops - Clarendon Place - 5 minutes
* Bus stop at the end of the street
* Rangebank Primary School - 15 minutes
* Cranbourne Secondary College - 3 minutes by car, 20 minute walk
Close by to:
*Cranbourne Homemaker Centre - 20 minute walk
*Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre - 5 minutes by car, 25 minute walk
*Casey Race - 6 minutes by car, 40 minute walk
*Casey Fields - 10 minutes by car
*Fountain Gate Shopping Centre - 15 minutes by car
*Casey Central Shopping Centre - 10 minutes by car
Features:
*Air conditioner
*Ceiling fans
*Central space heater
*Kitchen/meals
*Formal lounge
*3 bedrooms all carpeted
*Entrance and hallway carpeted
*Family bathroom with bathtub, shower recess and vanity
*Separate Laundry
*Separate Toilet
*Full length covered (colourbond/laserlite) pergola/alfresco
*DLUG
*Fully fenced and secure
*Room for extra cars/van/boat
*Well maintained and low maintenance front and rear yards
*Subdividable (subject to STCA)
The central area of Cranbourne is one of the most established and sought after areas. With a mix of older homes on larger blocks and units. Located within walking distance to all facilities, including the newly renovated Cranbourne Park, a range of restaurants, Cranbourne Secondary College and Cranbourne Train Station. Cranbourne Central provides the perfect combination for any resident.
At Ray White Cranbourne our price indications are based upon probable market value, the likely selling price and vendor expectations. You can view with confidence that vendors will sell within the range with favourable conditions.
*PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT ALL OPEN INSPECTIONS*

Description:
**UNDER OFFER / UNDER CONTRACT**
CRANBOURNE (125894862): **NO BODY CORPORATE FEES APPLICABLE, ADDITIONAL NEW HOME GRANT AVAILABLE FOR FIRST HOME BUYERS ON UNIT 9A** Either buy one or both the choice is yours! Here lies 2 units on the same block available for sale with loads of appeal for both owner occupiers and shrewd investors looking to capitalize on this prime location right in the heart of Cranbourne!
The original front house has been extensively renovated and presents almost like new with the added advantage for investors of having existing tenants that can provide an instant return. Featuring a lounge/dining room with a split system heater/air conditioner as well as a tiled meals area adjoining the renovated galley style kitchen with stainless steel appliances. There are 2 robed bedrooms, a study/3rd bedroom, a stylish bathroom with separate toilet plus a full laundry.
The rear unit is brand new and ready to accept its first occupants who will enjoy features including a living/dining area with floorboards and a split system heater/air conditioner, stone topped kitchen with stainless steel appliances, 2 robed bedrooms, 2 pristine bathrooms and a separate toilet.
Both units also feature a single carport secured by a remote roller door and a private courtyard that is easy to maintain!
Top location within close proximity to the Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre and the recently constructed amenities running right along Thompsons Road. Sport and recreation facilities, Cranbourne/Merinda Park train stations and other forms of public transport are all close by. There is also easy access to medical clinics, kindergartens, child care centres, Casey Grammar School and Cranbourne Secondary College. If you happen to work in the CBD, take full advantage of the immediate freeway access!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW (PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS)!
Our floor plans are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy or details contained in our floor plans.

Description:
CALLING ALL FIRST HOME BUYERS.....I'M LIKE A DISPLAY HOME BUT YOU DON'T HAVE TO WAIT FOR ME TO BE BUILT !!
The living is easy in this impressive, generously proportioned 3 years young residence, the floor plan encompasses 3 spacious bedrooms, master with ensuite and extra big walk in robe, a formal lounge/home office, a well appointment family bathroom with separate bath and shower, a sleek and stylish kitchen with huge pantry, Caesar bench tops, stainless steel appliances and loads of storage, that flows onto a sun filled family room/dining zone.
Outside offers an easy to maintain private yard with a double lock up garage, a decked area and retains the value of peaceful living whilst being conveniently close to shops, schools, tafe and transport.

Description:
Something Special In Cranbourne, Opposite Parkland!
Here we have an excellent family home for everyone and their toys. Situated on a 574M2 (approx.) allotment. The home is comprised of 4 bedrooms, master with ensuite and WIR, family bathroom, 2 large open plan living areas and remote DLUG with rear access as well as the added benefit of internal access to home. Jam packed with features the home has an expansive modern designer kitchen with masses of thick stone bench tops, glass splash backs, stainless steel appliances and an abundance of cupboards cleverly laid out to adjoining meals area.
You will love the accessible hideaway for your boat or caravan and the private secure rear back yard further enhanced by the covered outdoor area ideal for all year round entertaining.
Further comprising, heating/cooling, high ceilings with stylish cornices, quality window coverings timber floors. This home is a fantastic opportunity to get into an impressive Estate. Don't miss out!

Description:
4 Bedroom in CBD Cranbourne on 644m2!
Whether you are looking for your first home, downsizing or for a solid investment, this jam-packed home situated on a 644m2 block is the one for you!
This charming brick home offers 4 bedrooms, 3 of the bedrooms with built in robes and brand new quality carpets, plus the versatile extra to use the fourth room as either another bedroom or study. Central bathroom with separate toilet, laundry which offers plenty of room, fully equipped kitchen with an abundance of cupboard space, brand new gas cook top and oven, dishwasher and fridge area which adjoins the large living/meals area. You'll love the added feature on a Coonara wood heater, which is perfect for this winter chill.
Retreat in your own your spacious private low maintenance backyard, which features a small paved undercover terrace and garden shed for extra storage.
Other internal inclusions are:
- Down lights
- Split system heating and air-conditioning.
- Ceiling fans
- Floating Floor boards
- Brand new Carpet
Nestled in the heart of Cranbourne and within close proximity to all amenities including shops, schools, public transport and freeways, this property offers convenience at your fingertips.
